title: @Riot [Request]
body: Now that the kiddies have had their URF filled fun it's time to get serious and let the real men (and women) fight it out. Give us a chance at NURF, give us a chance to strategically play a strategic game using the Strategic Buff of Strategistic Strategery.

replies.body:
It might sound fun, but it was really really really boring after the first couple laughs!

We had to use cheats just to capture the footage without taking 8 hours...

It shouldn't **have** to be about fun though, just being a new way to play should be good enough and it is for many people. You'll never know whether people like it, despite how supposedly boring it is, until you give people a chance to play. You caved on the constant spam of "bring back URF" why not give us, the ones who are simply asking, a chance to play NURF?
Whoever neg'd this is an ass, it's a great point, and i honestly don't see why we can't have Nurf, cause we all know 8 hours is an exaggeration (i'm sure someone would surrender.)
Yeah i was disappointed that they didn't even run NURF for at least a day.
Same. I really wanted to play it.
I wanted to play it to but ghostly is right the queue would be 5-10 mins because no one else would've wanted to play it :(
So? I'm willing to put up with long queues to try out a new mode.

I would've liked it if NURF was some sort of feature in URF, But I'm cool if we get tested on NURF.
Still, If Riot released NURF for a bit, I think they'd get a lot of hate from the community and not much people would play it.
If they released it I bet it would have 5-10 minute queues.
